featured.text: He then wandered around the world with his camera, using a handheld camera to catch images from fleeting moments of everyday life.
When it rains, a thin layer of fresh water forms on top of the ocean, providing the snakes with a fleeting opportunity to lap up that precious resource.

definition.en_def: Lasting for a very short time; transient.
definition.example: The beauty of the sunset was fleeting, disappearing within minutes.
